thread.title: Kenneth Way
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Kenneth Way

author: Kenneth Way
title: Kenneth Way
text: I received excellent customer service from framesdirect.com. My rx sunglasses ended getting delayed in customs but the customer rep I dealt with kept my in the loop and was even able to get me a discount because of the delay. I was able to deal with the same person through out the whole process as well.
